Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a healthy plant that has enough water and light.
The student can draw a plant that has no water and describe or show how it looks different from the healthy plant.
The student can draw a plant that has no light and describe or show how it looks different from the healthy plant.
The student can use their drawing to show that plants need light to live and grow.
The student can use their drawing to show that plants need water to live and grow.
